snippet: Nadal made a dominant return to tennis after a two-month injury layoff, beating Richard Gasquet, 6-4, 6-0, in Beijing.
abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats Richard Gasquet at the China Open in Beijing, marking triumphant return to tennis following two-month injury layoff.
lead_paragraph: Nadal made a dominant return to tennis after a two-month injury layoff, beating Richard Gasquet, 6-4, 6-0, in Beijing.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Triumphs at China Open in Return to Court
